General.Name: Shenzhen Xinhao Photoelectricity Technology Co. Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Xinhao Photoelectricity Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of precision optical components. It offers glass protection panels and capacitive touch screen modules for use in smartphones/tablets/notebooks/smart wearable devices, medical/special industry, and Internet of vehicles terminal applications. Shenzhen Xinhao Photoelectricity Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2013 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
